Jqsatoy3.title: Application of pre-gelatinized modified starches in preparation of mochi bread
Jqsatoy3.abstract: Effects of pre-gelatinized cassava modified starch, pre-gelatinized potato starch, pre-gelatinized maize modified starch and pre-gelatinized rice flour on the sensory quality of mochi bread were evaluated by analysis of the specific volume, resilience and Brabender viscographs of Mochi Bread. The results showed that Mochi bread prepared with pre-gelatinized cassava, potato modified starch had good taste and appearance. But the Mochi bread prepared with pre-gelatinized maize modified starch or rice flour had no good taste and smaller specific volume. When the mass ratio of pre-gelatinized cassava to potato modified starch was 1:1, Mochi bread had the best processing performance, fresh taste and resilience, as well as the largest specific volume and the best shape retention.

s7rldt5l.title: Summarization on stability of wind power systems based on bifurcation theory
s7rldt5l.abstract: With wind farm capacity continuously increasing, remarkable characteristics of wind power make nonlinear dynamic characteristics of wind power system more apparent than conventional power system. Domestic and international experience shows that the voltage instability is main forms of wind power system instability. The bifurcation theory is one of the most powerful tools in analysis of structure stability of nonlinear dynamic system. Therefore application of bifurcation theory not only reveals the voltage stability mechanism, but also has important theoretic value and practical value for the security analysis of the whole power system, especially for voltage stability of wind power system. © (2012) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

TWHSlRxy.title: Effect of Modified Starch on the Properties of Mochi
TWHSlRxy.abstract: Effect of cross-linking hydroxypropyl modified tapioca starch (HS-B)on the properties of Mochi was studied in this paper. The results indicated that adding cross-linking hydroxypropyl modified tapioca starch could significantly improve the appearance, texture and shelf life of the Mochi product. The best ratio of glutinous rice flour to cross-linking hydroxypropyl modified tapioca starch was 4:1, with which the achieved Mochi product showed the best quality.

72MI3nzd.title: Effect of hydrophilic colloid on the quality of sponge cake
72MI3nzd.abstract: The effects of xanthan gum, sodium alginate and gellan gum on the specific volume, moisture content, water activity and texture of sponge cake were studied in the paper. According to the test of specific volume, moisture content, water activity and TPA, the results showed that the sodium alginate could improve the volume of cake obviously, and the volume of cake reached the maximum value when the dosage was 0.10%. Xanthan gum, sodium alginate and gellan gum all could increase the moisture content which reached the maximum value when the dosage of sodium alginate was 0.15%. Adding 0.10% sodium alginate could lower the water activity significantly. The texture test showed that adding 0.10% xanthan gum or 0.05% sodium alginate could delay the aging of cake. The microbiological examination showed that sodium alginate could decrease the water activity of the cake, and restrain the growth of mildew. According to the influential factors, adding 0.10% sodium alginate in sponge cake was suggested to improve the quality of sponge cake.

vLzGnWSW.title: The Study of Papermaking Characters of PBO Precipitated Pulp
vLzGnWSW.abstract: The papermaking characters of PBO(poly-paraphenylene-benzobisoxazole)precipitated pulp were studied in this paper.PBO precipitated pulp has a good dispersion character and papermaking characters with PBO short fiber and fibrillated pulp.The results showed that the PBO paper made from precipitated pulp,fibrillated pulp and short fiber at the proportion of 4 ∶3 ∶3 had good properties.The break length is 1.21km,tear index is 3.13 mN·m2/g, burst index is 3.19 kPa·m2/g.

CQtMABA6.title: Static security analysis applies in the network of SINOPEC Tianjin
CQtMABA6.abstract: It is of great significance for us to research security problems in the power system. After choosing static security, related theories and methods to be main research object, we calculate power flow and use transferring load as safety countermeasures for power restoration at the same time. Here, we select the Newton method. Then, making the static analysis module of PSASP as the electric power system simulation software to apply in analyzing power flow and N-1 open circuit, which is under the biggest operation in petrochemical system. At last, we get related overload information in order to inspect whether the operation method and the connection mode of SINOPEC network is safe, and facilitate the ability of risking given accident, and take corrective actions at last. © 2010 IEEE.

BaJKwBFO.title: Tracking and nonlinear analytical expression of saddle node bifurcation boundary in wind power system with STATCOM
BaJKwBFO.abstract: Referred to the conventional calculation method of two-dimensional parameter bifurcation boundary for electric power system,the two-dimensional saddle-node bifurcation boundary of wind power system node voltage is calculated by taking the injecting active power Pin of wind farm and the parameter KMdc of STATCOM as the bifurcation control parameters,which is then analyzed to obtain the voltage stability laws of wind power system affected by both injecting active power and STATCOM parameter.The quadratic polynomial is taken as the approximate nonlinear analytical expression of saddle node bifurcation boundaries in the parameter space of wind power system.Simulative results of an example show the precision and effectiveness of the proposed method in approaching the true border.

zE1tuEjb.title: Identification of the Wind Farm Based on Actual Data
zE1tuEjb.abstract: The current mathematical modeling methods of wind power system are introduced and compared in this paper.Mechanism modeling method commonly has such problems as poor accuracy and low universality,while modeling based on artificial neural network can overcome these shortcomings.This paper adopts BP network and Elman network to identify and model based on abundant actual data of wind farm and compares respectively in four aspects-training time,memory,accuracy and stability.

WHWZSzU7.title: Multi-parameter Hopf bifurcation analysis of wind power system
WHWZSzU7.abstract: The multi-parameter Hopf bifurcation analysis is utilized to research voltage stability of wind power system composed of induction generators. The impacts of active power and reactive power in wind power system and static var compensator (SVC) configured in wind farm on voltage stability are overall considered, and the two-parameter Hopf bifurcation analysis of wind power system is performed to obtain the two-parameter Hopf bifurcation boundary of active power and reactive power as well as the Hopf bifurcation boundary of active power and SVC parameters, namely its voltage reference and amplification factor. Results of this research show that the reactive power absorbed by wind farm restricts the injecting ability of active power; higher voltage reference and amplification factor of SVC contribute to increase active power output of wind farm, and then the instability due to voltage oscillation can be avoided; there is a certain complementarity between voltage reference and amplification factor, and their combined action contribute to delay Hopf bifurcation and improve voltage stability of wind power system.

vb8DBY4H.title: Identification and Selection on the Cold Resistance of Early Japonica Rice Varieties at their Booting Stage in Cold Region
vb8DBY4H.abstract: By the identification on the cold resistance of some rice varieties at their booting stage in Heilongjiang Province during the period of 2004 and 2010,we selected 63 first-grade and 180 second-grade materials of rice cold resistance at their booting stage,in which 20 materials have a good combination with the yielding ability,72 materials combine with the disease resistance well,6 materials combine with the quality well.And there are 23 materials about the special rice.17 rice varieties have been examined and approved.From 2008 to 2010,amount areas of the rice varieties applied have accumulated to the total number of 1,294,000 hm2,and it has provided the scientific basis for the production application,and created the anti-cold rice resources for the plant breeder.

sRScuoMq.title: Evaluation on the Cold Tolerance of Rice at Booting Stage in Sanjiang Plain
sRScuoMq.abstract: In order to select cold tolerance resources of rice,the evaluation on cold tolerance of 349rice materials at booting stage was conducted from 2004to 2010.The results showed that there were 63materials reaching the first grade cold tolerance and 180materials reaching the second grade cold tolerance,which broadening the cold tolerance source of rice at booting stage.Taking Kongyu 131as the cold tolerance standard variety for 7 consecutive years,79 materials were selected for better cold tolerance than Kongyu 131at booting stage,in which 15materials combined well with high yield,8materials combined well with high quality,and 13materials were special rice.The results of cold tolerance of rice in field identification were directly affected by climate factors,taking Kongyu 131as standard material,the test materials were divided into group of insensitive to low temperatare and group of sensitive to low temperature.

dqBB7rVs.title: Research on application of emulsion-stabilizer in half-milkfat ice cream
dqBB7rVs.abstract: The application of mixed emulsion-stabilizer in half-milkfat ice cream was studied in this paper. Guar gum, sodium carboxymethyl cellulose(CMC), locust bean gum as well as carrageenan were used as mixed stabilizers, and glycerol monostearate and sorbitan monostearate(Span 60) were used as mixed emulsion. The formula of functional system was optimized through the single factor experiment and orthogonal experiment, the effects of which were investigated by measurement of viscosity, overrun, melting rate and the sensory evaluation. The results showed that the optimal mixed emulsion-stabilizer for half-milkfat ice cream was guar gum0.020%, sodium carboxymethyl cellulose(CMC)0.060%, locust bean gum 0.040% carrageenan 0.020%, glycerol monostearate 0.10% and sorbitan monostearate(Span 60) 0.20%.With the application of this optimal mixed emulsion-stabilizer, the results of ice cream were obtained: overrun 79.0%, melting rate 5.0% and sensory evaluation39.

2PB6OYNR.title: Effects of maltdextrins on the stability and sensory properties of sweet milk
2PB6OYNR.abstract: This article was carried out to determine the effect of maltdextrins on the stability and sensory properties of sweet milk.The results showed that maltdextrins could improve the stability and sensory properties of sweet milk,the maltdextrins with lower DE value exerted greater impact.When the DE value of maltdextrins was 2,sweet milk gained better stability and sensory properties.

Jpks31kd.title: Tracking and Analysis of Multi-Parameter Saddle-Node Bifurcation Boundary of Wind Power System Containing Static Synchronous Compensator
Jpks31kd.abstract: Voltage stability is of significance problem to wind power generation system and static synchronous compensator(STATCOM) can effectively improve voltage stability of wind power generation system.Using bifurcation theory and taking the active power injected by wind power generation system and the voltage gains at AC and DC sides of STATCOM as control parameters,the multi parameter saddle-node bifurcation boundary of wind power generation system is traced;the regularity that impacts voltage stability of wind power generation system under combined action of multi parameters is analyzed;and to trace saddle-node bifurcation boundary with more than three parameters,a method which takes quadratic polynomial as approximate nonlinear analytic expression of saddle node bifurcation boundary is proposed.

ZZIBSh6b.title: Effect of Modified Starch on the Quality of Heat-resisting Fruit Jam
ZZIBSh6b.abstract: This paper discussed the influence of six waxy maize modified starches on the water retention, the heat-resisting, gel characters, appearance and taste of heat-resisting fruit jam (HRFJ). The results indicated that two phosphate cross-linking hydroxypropylated waxy corn starches with low cross linking degree were unsuitable to HRFJ because of their inferior heat-resisting quality. Another two phosphate cross-linking hydroxypropylated waxy corn starches and two adipic acid cross-linking acetic acid esterified waxy corn starches could improve the heat- resisting and the water retention of HRFJ, endowing the products with good texture and taste. Among these modified starch, phosphate cross-linking hydroxypropylated waxy corn starch CR3010 with high cross linking degree showed good thermostability and acid-resistant properties. It was more suitable to be used in the HRFJ.

VD0mvWrL.title: Chemical Modification of the Surface of PBO Fibers
VD0mvWrL.abstract: The methods of chemical surface modification,consist of etching and swelling,were used to modify the surface of PBO fibers in this paper.The modified PBO fibers were characterized through scanning electronic microscope(SEM) and BET.The influence of treating time and treating temperature of the surface treatments with chemical reagents on the morphology of PBO Fibers was studied.The results showed that the optimal effect of etching could be obtained by using 1.0% etching solution S for three minutes,the smooth skins of the PBO fibers were peeled off and exfoliated along the core.The surface morphology of the fibers changed greatly after swelling with the swelling agent K solution and beating.The surface of PBO fibers became rough and with microfibril structure.Meanwhile, the specific surface area of PBO fibers increased greatly,from the original 0.73 m~2/g increased to 10.88m~2/g.It demonstrated that the increase of the roughness and the interfacial areas between fibers would enhance the strength of interlacement.

ifEkfTwH.title: Effect of compound enzymes on quality of bread
ifEkfTwH.abstract: Effects of complex application of glucose oxidase(GOD),transglutaminase(TG)and lipase(LIP)on the hardness,elasticity and moisture migration of the bread were studied.Results show that addition of complex enzymes could effectively delay the aging of bread,increase the elasticity holding capacity and improve the water retention capacity during the storage period.Among them,adding TG 30 ppm and LIP 20 ppm had the most obvious effect on delaying the hardness of bread,adding GOD 20 ppm and LIP 10 ppm was best for elasticity holding capacity,and adding GOD 30 ppm,TG 20 ppm was best for the water retention capacity of the bread.

oILybf2o.title: Research on grid-based wind farm modeling
oILybf2o.abstract: Wind power generation develops very fast in every country as a kind of important regenerative energy. The modeling of wind farm is the foundation of controlling and optimizing it. This paper introduced in detail the mathematics model at present and modeling methods in this field. What's more, it also outlined the factors what should be considered during the modeling process. At last the trend of wind farm modeling was proposed according to the development of wind generation and relative techniques.

RribspQp.abstract: Effect of kongac gum,guar gum and xanthan gum on the stability of a formulated sour soybean milk drink was studied in the paper.The stability was measured and observed for a long time.The results show that when the mixed proportion was 3∶2∶3 and the addition was 0.06%,the stability of the formulated sour soybean milk drink was best.

0CdlirNX.title: Preparation and application of phosphorous-containing bio-polyols in polyurethane foams
0CdlirNX.abstract: A bio-polyol phosphonate acting as the polyol component in the preparation of polyurethane foam was synthesized from the liquefaction product of bagasse by the halogenation of the liquefaction product followed by the Michaelis-Arbuzov rearrangement. The FT-IR spectra showed that phosphorus-containing groups were introduced into the polyol chain. The data of the viscosity and the hydroxyl number suggested that the bio-polyol phosphonate would be a good polyol component in the preparation of polyurethane foam. The limiting oxygen index of polyurethane foam containing bio-polyol phosphonate varied in the range of 24-28, while that of polyurethane foam without bio-polyol phosphonate was 23, demonstrating that the introduction of the phosphorus-containing group into the polymer helped to improve the flame retardancy. ? 2014 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.

fIByaWU8.title: Analysis of Frequency Dynamic Characteristics of Enterprise Grid with Internal Short-Circuit Fault
fIByaWU8.abstract: The dynamic characteristics of system frequency during the internal short-circuit fault occurring in Tianjin petrochemical enterprise grid were analyzed.The impacts of the variations of the active power vacancy and other relevant parameters on the frequency dynamic process were pointed out.The grid model of Tianjin petrochemical grid was established and the simulation of the transition process after failure was made,which demonstrated the correctness of the conclusion.It can be valuable reference for taking effective measures to restrain the rapid changing and collapse of the frequency when internal fault occurred in enterprise grid.

B5weJwiF.title: Hybrid systems theory and its application in photovoltaic power generation system
B5weJwiF.abstract: In recent years, hybrid systems theory and its applications have been focus researched. At first, commonly used models of hybrid systems research were classified overviewed, and then concept of hybrid systems theory were introduced. On the basis of this, analysis and optimization of hybrid systems were summarized in this paper. At last, the applications of hybrid systems theory in photovoltaic power generation system were analyzed and future research directions were prospected. © 2010 IEEE.

QrDIi5aN.title: Research of control technology in grid-connected photovoltaic power system
QrDIi5aN.abstract: Grid-connected photovoltaic power system is not only related to solar battery and grid inverter technology, but also involves the system control and optimization problem. The research and improvement about control technology play a vital role in improving the efficiency of the system and Realizing optimization grid. On the basis of considering about control requirements in grid-connected photovoltaic power system, the paper analyzes comprehensively the control technology about MPPT, grid of inverter and island detection. At last, the paper points out the research hotspots and development trend in each part. © 2010 IEEE.

JcovL6B2.title: Dynamic Frequency Analysis on Industrial Electric Power Network under External Fault Condition
JcovL6B2.abstract: The condition of thermal power plant of some SINOPEC is simply introduced first, after choosing its receiving operation, enterprise internal power’s dynamic frequency characteristic mechanism has been analyzed under external fault condition, and then arriving at a conclusion that the dynamic frequency characteristic has something to do with active power shortage and frequency adjustment effect modulus of load. At last, having selected the reasonable failure mode and mathematical models in software PSASP7.0 to simulate this dynamic frequency characteristics curve of the system, we can verify the validity of the conclusion. The above is good for revealing the weak link of the plant in future and laying the foundation for finding the way to improve the reliability of the system. At the same time, it also has some reference value for other enterprise grid.
JcovL6B2.venue: ICMTMA '10 Proceedings of the 2010 International Conference on Measuring Technology and Mechatronics Automation - Volume 02

voTaVmus.title: The research situation and application of superconducting fault current limiters
voTaVmus.abstract: The Superconducting Fault Current Limiter(SFCL) is a new model of power equipments to raise the security and stability of the power network.It can be used to restrict short-circuit current effectively in power systems by basic character of superconductors.According to the research results of many papers,this paper gives a systematical classification about the SFCL.Based on this classification and the research situation at present,the operation principles of the resistive type,magnetic shield type,Saturated Core SFCL and bridge type SFCL are analyzed in detail.Then the Location of SFCL in power systems is given.Finally,some application problems in practice and the developing trend are explained.

FYSqvkdL.abstract: This article introduces the classification and composition of Grid-connected Photovoltaic Power System, and the research status of its nonlinear behavior. In the Photovoltaic Power System, photovoltaic array, DC/DC converter, DC/AC inverter and nonlinear load will appear lots of nonlinear dynamic behavior such as bifurcation and chaos phenomena. The paper elaborates the DC/DC converter and DC/AC inverter in the Photovoltaic Power System, and analyses their nonlinear phenomena. © (2012) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

d23C3w1a.title: Diameter controlling of electrospun lignin nanofibers: Effect of molecular weight
d23C3w1a.abstract: Three types of lignin nanofibers were prepared using different molecular weight of lignin from lignin/acetic acid solution by electrospinning. Effects of solution concentration, molecular weight of lignin, and addition of polymer on the morphology and diameter of nanofibers were systematically investigated by scanning electron microscope (SEM). The morphology of nanofibers changed with the changing of solution concentration and polymer molecular weight. Fibrous structure could be stabilized when the solution concentrations of high molecular weight (LH), medium molecular weight (LM) and low molecular weight (LL) were higher than 30 wt.%, 35 wt.% and 40 wt.%, respectively. Fiber diameter increased with the increase of solution concentration and lignin molecular weight. The addition of polymer, e. g. cellulose acetate (CA), resulted in the reduction of beads.

tbSw4M0S.title: Chemical modification of the surface of PBO fibers
tbSw4M0S.abstract: The methods of chemical surface modification, consist of etching and swelling, were used to modify the surface of PBO fibers in this paper. The modified PBO fibers were characterized through scanning electronic microscope (SEM) and BET. The influence of treating time and treating temperature of the surface treatments with chemical reagents on the morphology of PBO Fibers was studied. The results showed that the optimal effect of etching could be obtained by using 1.0% etching solution S for three minutes, the smooth skins of the PBO fibers were peeled off and exfoliated along the core. The surface morphology of the fibers changed greatly after swelling with the swelling agent K solution and beating. The surface of PBO fibers became rough and with microfibril structure. Meanwhile, the specific surface area of PBO fibers increased greatly, from the original 0.73 m2/g increased to 10.88 m2/g. It demonstrated that the increase of the roughness and the interfacial areas between fibers would enhance the strength of interlacement.

uSI3pz2d.title: Research of Distribution System Reliability Based on Intelligence Algorithms
uSI3pz2d.abstract: The importance of the distribution system is mainly described, which is one of the three major parts of the power system. To summarize the conventional reliability algorithms, aiming at their shortcomings and then putting forward two significant intelligence algorithms: fuzzy evaluation and artificial intelligence method, followed by a brief description about how they achieve their computational aims and some of advantages and disadvantages about them. Finally, the future development of distribution reliability evaluation was prospected. It has some reference value for researches who are engaged in doing reliability work in power system.

uCyhvafb.title: Selection and Analysis of Maximum Short-circuit Current Point
uCyhvafb.abstract: The network model of any two nodes was built.After equivalent simplification,the position of the maximum short-circuit current point at the time of three-phase short circuit of the lines occurring between any two nodes(including the nodes) was obtained by using mathematical theory analysis.Taking the IEEE-NEWENGLAND10-39-bus system as the example,the simulation verification of the thirty-four branches was carried out by using PSASP,which showed the correctness of the conclusion and provided theoretical basis for the grid planning design,the calculation of three-phase short-circuit current,the calibration of the interrupting capacity of circuit breaker and the analysis of the level of line short-circuit current.

Cpr7Fb0m.title: Using of cascaded inverter in photovoltaic system controlled by chaos theory
Cpr7Fb0m.abstract: Using cascaded inverter in photovoltaic system, when number of cascaded unit increases, unbalance usage becomes a problem. Put forward the balance control method of chaos mapping and the method of photovoltaic power inspecting. It can be concluded from the distribute procedure based on random function that the active probability of each photovoltaic power and switching devices is same. The method of Logistic chaos mapping and tent mapping applied to cascaded inverter are proposed. Also propose the idea of inspect photovoltaic power's stability by chaos theory. © 2010 IEEE.

Rae3Phna.title: Nonlinear analytical expression of bifurcation boundary in wind power system parameter space
Rae3Phna.abstract: In order to make an accurate analytical description of the bifurcation boundary in wind power system parameter space,firstly,Taylor expansion is implemented on boundary conditions which the saddle node bifurcation meets, and higher terms are omitted. On the basis of this treatment,quadratic polynomial is considered as approximate analytical expression of saddle node bifurcation boundaries in wind power system parameter space. At last,by simulation of an example, the high precision and effectiveness of the method to approach true border is tested and verified. With the help of this method, problem of bifurcation parameter space dimension constraints can be easily solved by multi-parameter bifurcation studies of wind power system. A mathematical description of the bifurcation boundary is more conducive to determine the conditions under which saddle node bifurcation of wind power system occurs at deeper level. This work is supported by National Natural Science Foundation of China (No. 50877053) and Natural Science Foundation of Tianjin (No.09JCYBJC07100).

iwXC3LTN.title: Industry status and development trends of collagen peptides
iwXC3LTN.abstract: Collagen peptides(CPs) emerging as a new functional protein ingredients,were developing rapidly at home and abroad in recent years.In order to scientifically guide the industry crowd engaged and concerned about the CPs and promote the healthy and sustainable development of the CPs industry,the CPs definition,properties,preparation technology as well as current situation of domestic and foreign CPs industry were reviewed in this paper.And the three questions which concerned about by the downstream production enterprises and consumers during the promotion process of CPs,including the relationship between raw material sources and CPs product quality,the relationship between CPs efficacy and molecular weight,and the applied laws and regulations of CPs,were clarified.Finally,the research and development trends of CPs were prospected.

Bpgj2SO7.title: A review of application of sensitivity in power system
Bpgj2SO7.abstract: Sensitivity method is to get the level of sensitivity of dependent variable to independent variable by using differential relationship of some physical quantities in the system. It has been widely used in the analysis and control of power system. From the point of time, sensitiveness analysis method can be divided into two categories, static sensitivity and trajectory sensitivity. And according to the different considered variables, they are reviewed respectively in this paper. Application of sensitiveness analysis method in the power system reflects essential research value. ? (2014) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

VTWMcdGA.abstract: This paper puts forward the background of the CRC arithmetic by which it means how important the arithmetic can be in the field of the communication, tells us the principles of CRC arithmetic, introduces a kind of common ways about how to make the code and how to decode of the CRC arithmetic, uses a lot of words to introduce how the CRC codes be made through one kind of the CRC arithmetic which is called CRC-16, gives the main idea of programming and a part of the program. 01xtVvew.title: Research on smart grid technology
01xtVvew.abstract: In this paper the conception, feature and Technical Composition of smart grid is expounded, and the development process and present research status of smart grid home and abroad as well as the practical significance of developing smart grid in China are introduced. The paper analyzes the characteristics and direction of China's smart grid development, and point out that the development of smart grid requires the development of many smart grid technologies and the building of grid structure, and detailed describes the realization of the self-healing function as well as distributed power generation technology.

Li46EN0a.title: The static bifurcation analysis of statcom on power system voltage stability
Li46EN0a.abstract: The bifurcation study of power system voltage stability has an important role in understanding the voltage unstable process deeply. Bifurcation theory includes both static and dynamic bifurcation. Static bifurcation study is the primary task of bifurcation theory. The bifurcation study can analyze the impact of dynamic control performance on voltage stability especially for flexible AC system(FACTS) such as static synchronous compensator(STATCOM) and static var compensator (SVC). The reactive power compensation effect of STATCOM is better than SVC. In this paper, a kind of toolbox of MATLAB, PSAT, is used for the comparative static bifurcation analysis for power system with and without STATCOM, and the bifurcation value on the point is studied. The studied results show that STATCOM can add load limit and delay static bifurcation to improve voltage stability. © 2011 IEEE.

tibOifFs.title: Structure and properties of cellulose/poly(N-isopropylacrylamide) hydrogels prepared by SIPN strategy.
tibOifFs.abstract: Semi-interpenetrating polymer network (SIPN) strategy was employed to fabricate a kind of novel hydrogels composed of cellulose and poly(N-isopropylacrylamide) (PNIPAAm) in the presence of N,N'-methylenebisacrylamide (MBAAm) as the crosslinker and benzoyl peroxide (BPO) as the initiator. The results from FTIR and TGA indicated that the network indeed existed in the SIPN hydrogels. The data from experiments, those related to the swelling behavior of the hydrogels at different temperatures in particular, demonstrated the thermal sensitivity of these hydrogels. The impact of crosslinker content on the hydrogel properties was discussed as well. The swelling ratio of hydrogels decreased with increasing the content of MBAAm. Besides, the loading and releasing behavior of the hydrogels were examined using dimethyl methylene blue as a model drug. These novel hydrogels combining the advantages of natural polymer with thermal responsive behavior are of great potential to be applied to drug delivery and control release systems.

TfwKI5LZ.abstract: Effects of the dosages of brown rice powder,oat powder,malt powder and sucrose on the taste and mouth feel of brown rice syrup and effects of the contents of carrageenan,sodium alginate,carboxy methyl cellulose (CMC) and xanthan gum on the stability of brown rice syrup were studied by orthogonal experiments in the paper. The results showed that the best contents of brown rice powder,oat powder,malt powder,sucrose,carrageenan,sodium alginate,CMC,and xanthan gum were 4%,0.5%,0.2%,6% ,0.15‰,0.1‰,0.3‰ and 0.3‰,respectively.

6cRMAS1m.title: Hybrid automata modeling and simulation for single-phase shunt APF
6cRMAS1m.abstract: Active power filter (APF) is a typical hybrid dynamic system. And the accuracy of its model directly affects the understanding of the movement laws and the design performance of the controller. According to hybrid automata modeling theory, partition of the state space in single-phase shunt APF movement is analyzed in this paper. Then the hybrid automaton model is established. The model can accurately reflect dynamical motion characteristics of the single-phase shunt APF. Simulation results illustrate the effectiveness and validity of the proposed mode. © Springer-Verlag 2012.

dQorz2Zq.title: The design of new wind power controller Based on Superconducting Magnetic Energy Storage
dQorz2Zq.abstract: The fluctuation and intennittent with wind power output, as a key factor to connect a large-scale wind power system to grid, which result s in an adverse impact on the power system continues to grow. In order to reduce the net stability impact of the grid. The wind farm power controller based on superconducting magnetic energy storage (SMES) is presented. Based on SMES's four-quadrant power operation capability and millisecond response speed, fluctuations in the active and reactive power of a wind farm are compensated, so that grid power reaches constant. At last, the validity and feasibility of power controlling instrument is validated by simulation with matlab / simulink. © 2010 IEEE.

jWTBrzNw.title: The Voltage Hopf Bifurcation Research for Wind Power System Based on the Continuation Method
jWTBrzNw.abstract: In order to study the effect on voltage stability by changes of the wind power plant parameters.In the paper,taking reactive power of wind power plant as controllable parameter,the bifurcation analysis on single parameter voltage stability is performed.Then on the basis of single parameter analysis,active power was selected as the second controllable parameter to determine two-parameter bifurcation boundary and conduct two-parameter conditionality analysis.At last the controlling role of static var compensator(SVC) on Hopf bifurcation was analyzed.The research results showed that active power output of wind power plant was limited by reactive power absorbed by wind power plant,and SVC could delay Hopf bifurcation,increase wind power system voltage stability region.

YgdOXJbd.title: Check circuit breaker rupturing capacity in industrial electric power network
YgdOXJbd.abstract: This paper took the check of rupturing capacity circuit breaker in petrochemical electric power network for example .It introduced the selection rule of largest short-circuit current which flow through circuit breaker, the principle of short circuit calculation, the equivalent model of external system , the modeling of mathematical model of industrial electric owned power network, and the procedures of short circuit calculations. At same time, the different short-circuit current was calculated which flow through the circuit breaker in both original petrochemical electric power network and the rebuilding one. At last, the simulation example proved that the margin of short-circuit current is less and less or even exceeding with the growth in the loads, increasing in self-power supply and external system in industrial electric power network The industrial should pay sufficient attention to it. © 2010 IEEE.

yAGkLqIV.title: Wind Power System Voltage Stability Research Based on Hopf Bifurcation Theory
yAGkLqIV.abstract: In order to study the effect on voltage stability by continuous changes of the wind power system parameters.Using the active power and reactive power as the bifurcation parameters,single parameter Hopf bifurcation point and two parameters Hopf bifurcation boundary are calculated based on the continuation method by using the bifurcation theory with wind power system dynamic models,and the effect of parameters on Hopf bifurcation is studied,meanwhile the controlling function of static var compensator(SVC) on Hopf bifurcation is analyzed.The research results show that active power is limited by reactive power,SVC can delay Hopf bifurcation,increase wind power system voltage stability region.

U9R0AyAJ.title: An overview on energy internet
U9R0AyAJ.abstract: Nowadays people pay more and more attention on renewable energy, but existing grid is not enough to accept scale renewable energy, especially distributed renewable energy. The structure of energy internet is similar with existing information Internet that consists of the energy router, power generation equipment, energy storage and load. Among them, the energy router is the most critical equipment that responsible for information management, voltage conversion and AC-DC conversion. Energy internet is friendly to environment with communicating with the user in real time and achieving plug and play. The development of energy internet has just begun and still in the pre-feasibility stage with many problems need to be solved.

XJz866gV.title: The Simulation Study of Auto Disturbance Rejection Controller Based on S-Function
XJz866gV.abstract: In this paper, the system functions(S-Function) such as Tracking-Differentiator (TD), Extended-State-Observer (ESO) and Non-linear-State-Error-feedback (NLSEF) were written, the model of Auto Disturbance Rejection Controller (ADRC) was established. Through a simple second-order system as the object, the ADRC and PID algorithms were simulated. After analysis and comparison of these two different control algorithm simulation results, the results show that ADRC has good dynamic performance and strong robustness.

C8bA3rqA.title: Review on wind speed model research in wind power systems dynamic analysis
C8bA3rqA.abstract: The stability of wind power systems is becoming a hot research with the expansion of the total installed capacity of wind power; wind speed model is of great significance in dynamic stability analysis of wind power systems. In this paper, taking into account the random and uncontrollable nature of wind speed variations, wind speed model research status at home and abroad is summarized from different points of view, and model character is analyzed. Finally, some existing problems and further research are proposed.

QHd3leoN.title: Study on Isolation of Hemicelluloses from Corn Cob via Ultrasound-assisted Diluted Alkali Extraction
QHd3leoN.abstract: The water-soluble(HA) and water-insoluble(HB) hemicelluloses were successfully isolated from corn cob by a two step ultrasound-assisted diluted alkali extraction method.The yield and the structural features of the hemicelluloses obtained from the two step extraction processes under different alkali concentration during the ultrasound pretreatment were investigated.The results showed that the yield of a short time ultrasound treatment followed by a 3h diluted alkali extraction was almost the same as that obtained by a 20h conventional diluted alkali extraction.Moreover,with an assistance of the ultrasound pretreatment,larger amount of water-soluble hemicelluloses were successfully isolated from corn cob.From the characterization results of IC,GPC,FT-IR and 1H-NMR,it can be seen that the water-soluble hemicelluloses obtained from this method have higher content of arabinose when comparing to those isolated via conventional alkali extraction method,which implied that such highly branched structure could endow them with better water solubility.Although a certain degree of the degradation of the hemicelluloses may be happened during this process,the original highly-branched structure of this natural polymer could be retained well and therefore,the biopolymer with such structure is supposed to be favorable to the following modification and utilization.

VGYYjCli.abstract: With the traditional energy exhausting rapidly, the development of new sustainable energy especially solar energy has a significant meaning. The paper mainly introduces some characteristics of photovoltaic (PV) power generation system involving in its development, construction and key technology. Solar cells can supply power energy through absorbing sunlight. As a result, some key technologies such as maximum power point tracking (MPPT), islanding detection and energy conversion are concerned by many investigators. Finally, this review gives some conclusion and prospective of PV power system. © (2012) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

iVgtQSc4.title: Preparation of thermo-sensitive hydrogels from acrylated lignin and N-isopropylacrylamide through photocrosslinking
iVgtQSc4.abstract: A novel thermo-sensitive hydrogel was obtained from acrylated lignin (LM) and N-isopropylacrylamide (NIPAAm) through UV photocrosslinking. The influences of the LM content on the hydrogel properties were investigated in terms of their lower critical solution temperature (LCST), interior morphology, temperature response kinetic, swelling and deswelling kinetics. The swelling ratio of the hydrogels at different temperature showed that these new smart hydrogels were responsive to the changes of external temperature. The DSC data demonstrated that the LCST of the hydrogels reduced with the increased content of LM in the hydrogels. The SEM images showed that increasing LM content resulted in the reduced pore size of the hydrogel. The swelling and deswelling behavior stated that the hydrogel with less LM content exhibited better temperature sensitivity.

qmbjHlSc.title: Review of harmonic detection methods for active power filters
qmbjHlSc.abstract: The problem of more and more serious reactive power and harmonic pollution to power systems is getting more and more serious, which has caused great concern. One of the key points for proper implementation of an APF is to use a reliable method for current/ voltage reference generation. Consequently, how to detect harmonic quickly and accurately becomes a crucial problem. From the perspective of historical development of detection methods, it experienced a course from frequency domain and time domain and neural network to Adaptive parameter identification. Several methods of measuring harmonic, such as wavelet/ S transform, Fourier transform are introduced and compared in this paper. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

y39veDK3.title: Impact of ultrasonic pretreatment on the liquefaction of bagasse in ethylene carbonate
y39veDK3.abstract: The influences of ultrasonic pretreatment on the morphology and liquefaction behavior of bagasse were studied. SEM images showed that the fiber surface of bagasse became less compact and the cell wall was broken severely after sonication. The FT-IR spectra of bagasse, however, showed that no significant change of chemical structure occurred after sonication. These increase the accessibility of the bagasse liber, accelerate the liquefaction, decrease the coupling of the free radicals derived from the liquefaction intermediates, which are in favor of liquefaction. The impacts of the sonication time, the frequency and the power of ultrasound on the morphology and liquefaction behavior of bagasse were investigated. The result showed that suitable frequency for the treatment is 28 kHz. Both prolonging the time of sonication and increasing the power of ultrasound reduce the residue rate of the liquefaction. The liquefaction process is also accelerated after sonication. The relative molecular weight distribution of the liquefaction product, however, has little change after the ultrasonic pretreatment, indicating that the liquefaction mechanism is not changed by sonication.

0icdUm7g.abstract: Colloids applied in baking jam contained in long shelf-life bread was studied.The effects of compound colloids on the sense and taste,texture,water holding capacity of the baking jam,and the quality of the bread contained the baking jam were researched with orthogonal experiments.The results indicated that adding 0.5% low-methoxy pectin,0.3% sodium alginate and 0.3% sodium carboxymethyl cellulose could provide a jam with uniform texture,suitable viscosity,resistance to baking and being used in three-month shelf-life bread,as well as 0.3% sodium alginate and 0.3% sodium carboxymethyl cellulose.

U7beQwZP.title: Synthesis and Characterization of the Flame-Retardant Copolymer Emulsions Used in Reinforcing Filter Papers
U7beQwZP.abstract: In the report, by using the semi-continuous technology of core/shell emulsion polymerization, the new flame retardant monomer N-(2,4,6-tri-Bromophenyl) maleimide(TBPMI) was introduced into the traditional filter paper reinforced emulsion polymerization, through adjusting the composition of monomers, synthesized the brominated acrylate core/shell copolymerization emulsion. Then the copolymers were characterized by FTIR, particle sizing analyzer, TG, SEM. Meanwhile, a quantitative analysis of the effect of the TBPMI content to the mechanical and flame retardant property of the filter paper has been done.

JVv59PDv.title: Rice Blast Resistant Gene Analysis of Rice Core Germplasm Longjing No.10 and Kendao No.10 in Cold Region
JVv59PDv.abstract: In order to make clear the genetic constitution of the resistance gene of the core genetic resources in cold region,10 F3 populations of Lijiangxintuanheigu×Longjing No.10 and Lijiangxintuanheigu×Kendao No.10 were inoculated by the seven single gene controlled strains(P-2b,Ken 53-33,Ina 72,Hoku 1,Ken54-20,Ken 54-04,Ina 168).Cumulative distribution curve method was applied.The results showed that the resistance of Longjing No.10 to P-2b,Ken 53-33,na 72 and Hoku 1 was controlled by 2 pairs dominant genes,to Ken 54-20 was controlled by 3 pairs dominant genes,to Ken 54-04 and Ina 168 was controlled by 2 pairs dominant genes and 1 pair recessive gene;that of Kendao No.10 to Ken 53-33 was controlled by 2 pairs dominant genes,to Ken 54-20 was controlled by 1 pair dominant gene,to Ken 54-04 was controlled by 2 pairs complementary dominant gene.Longjing No.10 and Kendao No.10 could be used as rice core germplasm of rice blast resistance in cold region to provide good rice blast resistance resource of parents selection for breeding,and made a good basis for building rice core germplasm bank in cold region and was important for rice production.

nMI5iSSJ.title: Overview of distribution network automation technology
nMI5iSSJ.abstract: This paper proposes a general overview of distribution network automation technology. With the continuous development of society and economy, the distribution network automation has become the trend and developing direction of electric power system. As the end part of the electric power system, the distribution network is directly connected to the consumers and plays a vital role in improving the quality and reliability of power supply. In order to provide reference for improving the reliability of distribution network and to speed up the development of distribution network automation, this paper analyses the system structure, development status and trend of distribution network automation technology. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

Gb2SMIXz.title: Analyze on Dynamic Frequency Characteristic of Industrial Electric Power Network under Power Situation when External Faults Occur
Gb2SMIXz.abstract: The dynamic frequency characteristics of industrial electric power network is Analyzed when external faults occurs. It reveals the active power gap, adjusting effect parameters and other related factors how to affect the frequency. Appropriate model is build about Tianjin Sinopec Company. Power transition process under external faults is simulated by PSASP. It proves the correctness of the conclusions. Above all, it is good for taking measures to ease lowering speed of frequency, change the steady-state value of frequency, and improving the safety and stability of industrial electric power network.

2GHnkbxZ.title: Dynamic Frequency Characteristics of Enterprise Power Network with External Faults
2GHnkbxZ.abstract: Analysis is made about the dynamic frequency characteristics of enterprise power network when external faults occur.And this paper reveals the impacts of such related parameters as the active power gap,effect coefficient on the frequency.Appropriate model for Tianjin Sinopec Company were established,and PSASP-based simulation analysis was made about the transition process after external faults occur.To sum up,in case of external faults,it is significant to take measures to ease lowering speed of frequency,and change the steady-state value of frequency,which can improve the safety and stability of enterprise power network.

5kcZm2zf.title: Influence of oxygen plasma treatment on the PBO paper properties
5kcZm2zf.abstract: The influence of oxygen plasma treatment on the PBO paper properties was studied in this paper. pzFI8dp8.title: MPPT control of photovoltaic system based on hybrid modeling and its simulation
pzFI8dp8.abstract: Photovoltaic (PV) system is composed of several elements as solar array, boost converter, inverter and load. The solar array should be integrated with a dc-dc converter and a control algorithm to perform a search to track the maximum power continuously. We adopt perturbation and observation method to implement Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) for solar cells. Owing to the existence of converters, photovoltaic system is a hybrid system contains continuous dynamic and discrete dynamic. Traditionally, the power electronic converter is difficult to model. This paper illustrates the modeling method of hybrid system, especially finite automata model. Based on Finite State Machine (FSM), the hybrid modeling of boost converter is presented. Finally, provides a simulation environment for such combination between continuous time system and finite automata, which employs the simulink and stateflow from Matlab.

LESRoLt6.title: The research of voltage stability in wind power system
LESRoLt6.abstract: Wind power is a kind of special electric power, because of the volatility of the wind, making voltage stability has become an important research problem wind power system must facing with. Therefore, according to the relevant current research status and the main existent problems of wind power system, expounding the difference of voltage stability between the conventional energy sources and the wind power, and the influence of voltage stability to the power system which caused by wind power system. This paper mainly from the definition and the classification to introduce the voltage stability; from the research contents and methods of static and dynamic voltage stability to analyze power systems which contains wind farms, especially emphasizing the necessity of the bifurcation theory used in power system contains wind power. Finally points out that the research trend of analysis and improvement in this area. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

5IyiE0Y9.title: Properties of hemicellulose-based hydrogels synthesized via ATRP
5IyiE0Y9.abstract: The hemicelluloses extracted from corncobs by traditional diluted alkali were employed to synthesize a temperature sensitive hemicellulose-based hydrogel via atom transfer radical polymerization (ATRP) and UV irradiation. The thermal sensitive moieties of PNIPAM and vinyl groups were introduced onto the side chain of the hemicellulose via ATRP in presence of the monomers, N-isopropylacrylamide (NIPAM) and ethylene glycol dimethacrylate (EDG). The results show that the hydrogels exhibit an obvious negative temperature responsive properties, and their temperature sensitivity and swelling/deswelling behavior are influenced by the crosslinking density, the mass fraction of hemicelluloses and NIPAM, and the dosage of the functional monomer as well.

ftI7Lsq2.title: Synthesis and Characterization of Auto-filter Paper Flame Retardant Copolymer Emulsion
ftI7Lsq2.abstract: In the study,the emulsion resins were synthesized by co-polymerizing a novel halogen-free flame retardant acrylic monomer with phosphorus moiety,diethyl(acryloyloxyethyl)-phosphonate(DEAEP) with styrene,acrylates through semi-continuous core/shell emulsion polymerization and conventional emulsion polymerization.The phosphorus acrylate copolymer emulsion was prepared by adjusting the monomer compositon.The chemical structure of the resins as well as the flammability and thermal stability of the papers were characterized by FTIR,LOI measurement and TG,respectively.The results indicate that the flame-retardant property of the papers was obviously increased with the content of DEAEP.And it is found that the emulsion polymerization process of filter paper impregnated with flame-retardant properties also have an impact on the flame retardance of acrylate copolymer emulsion,the use of semi-continuous core/shell emulsion polymerization process to prepare flame retardant resin is superior to conventional emulsion polymerization process.

tBQfYHzv.title: Preparation of thermo-sensitive hydrogels from acrylated lignin and N-isopropylacrylamide through photocrosslinking
tBQfYHzv.abstract: A novel class of hydrogels was prepared from an acetic acid lignin-based macromer and N-isopropylacrylamide through UV photocrosslinking. The lignin-based macromer was synthesized by substituting the hydroxyl groups in acetic acid lignin with acryloyl chloride. This macromer then reacted with N-isopropylacrylamide to form hydrogels via photocrosslinking. The hydrogels were investigated in terms of their swelling behavior, thermal behavior, and interior morphology. The results clearly showed that these newly synthesized hydrogels were sensitive to the changes of temperature. Differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) curves demonstrated that the lower critical solution temperature (LCST) of the hydrogels was reduced with an increase in the weight ratio of macromer/N-isopropylacrylamide. Scanning electron micrographs (SEM) showed that all hydrogels had porous network structures and that the pore sizes were dependent on the weight ratio of macromer/N-isopropylacrylamide. The deswelling data indicated that the hydrogels with less macromer content were more sensitive to the changes of temperature. Copyright © 2012 American Scientific Publishers All rights reserved.

h3hmi1CL.title: Tracking and nonlinear analytical expression of saddle node bifurcation boundary
h3hmi1CL.abstract: Referred to the conventional calculation method of two-dimensional parameter bifurcation boundary for electric power system, the two-dimensional saddle-node bifurcation boundary of wind power system node voltage is calculated by taking the injecting active power P in of wind farm and the parameter K Mdc of STATCOM as the bifurcation control parameters, which is then analyzed to obtain the voltage stability laws of wind power system affected by both injecting active power and STATCOM parameter. The quadratic polynomial is taken as the approximate nonlinear analytical expression of saddle node bifurcation boundaries in the parameter space of wind power system. Simulative results of an example show the precision and effectiveness of the proposed method in approaching the true border.

HbeDb0xO.title: Research on the control of three-phase two-stage grid-connected photovoltaic system and the selection of its parameters
HbeDb0xO.abstract: Three-phase two-stage grid-connected photovoltaic generation system is researched in this paper, the principle to select main parameters of the system is given, and parameters of current regulator and voltage regulator are adjusted based on the typical I and typical II system design principles and grid-connected control is realized. Owing to the existence of two-stage, where the maximum power tracking is achieved in the first stage and grid-connected is achieved via controlling inverter in the second stage. Also the independence of the two-stage, the system has a great expansion capability. Finally, the system is proved to be corresponding with IEEE Std 1547-2003 by numerical simulations. YANNTYm6.title: Study on Heat-Resistant Property of Emulsion Applied in Paper Strengthening
YANNTYm6.abstract: Silicone/styrene-acrylic copolymer emulsion with core-shell structure was prepared by seed emulsion polymerization, selecting vinyl-siloxane with high silicon content copolymerized with styrene and acrylate monomers. The morphology of the latex, the chemical structure and thermal stability of the copolymers were characterized by the methods of TEM, FTIR, DSC and TG. The results showed that the vinyl-siloxane and acrylate monomers were well copolymerized in the preparation of the emulsion and the particles exhibited an obvious core-shell structure. Furthermore, the initial thermal decomposition temperature of the copolymers increasesd significantly with the increase of the the vinyl-siloxane monomer dosage, and the thermal stability of the copolymers were improved obviously. Furthermore, the strengthening of the silicone/styrene-acylate copolymer emulsions on papers by addition in the pulps or impregnation were investigated as well.

xU3nafaS.title: Plasma modification on PBO fiber surface and interfacial properties of PBO fiber
xU3nafaS.abstract: Argon plasma combined with coupling agents was employed to modify the surface of poly [l,4-pheny-lene-cis-benzobisoxazole] (PBO) fiber. SEM, XPS and droplet profile method were then respectively used to determine the surface morphology, the composition and the contact angle of PBO fibers before and after the treatment. Moreover, the interfacial shearing strengths between PBO fiber and epoxy resin before and after the treatment were finally measured by the single-fiber pull-out test. It is found that the surface hydrophilicity of PBO fiber and the interfacial shearing strength between PBO fiber and epoxy resin are greatly improved after the modification, and that, in the conditions of 2% (mass fraction) of coupling agent, 2 min of treatment period, 30 W of power and 50 Pa of pressure, the contact angle between the fiber and water reduces from original more than 90° to 54.5°, and the corresponding interfacial shearing strength rises to 10.44MPa, increasing by 78%. Furthermore, both the interfacial shearing strength and the water hydrophilicity of PBO fiber are kept from becoming vestigial after the modification as time progresses.

AvaK7zN4.title: Hopf bifurcation analysis on dynamic voltage stability of wind power systems with SVC
AvaK7zN4.abstract: Hopf bifurcation frequently leads to periodic oscillations and even instability in nonlinear power systems. For Hopf bifurcation at equilibrium point in wind power systems, From the view of the structural stability, the static var compensator control effect on the Hopf bifurcation is analyzed, By tracking Hopf bifurcation point and two-parameter Hopf bifurcation boundary, The influence of the reactive power parameters of wind farms and the static var compensator parameters on dynamic voltage stability is analyzed. The study shows that static var compensator improves bus voltage stability and strengthens the power system equilibrium point stability by adjusting the local system's structural parameters, which can delay the Hopf bifurcation and improve the dynamic voltage stability of the nonlinear power system, this result is available for reference to voltage stability control of wind power systems.

TOqIxsIR.title: Analysis of influence on protective relaying of enterprise's power system at power switching
TOqIxsIR.abstract: When there is a switching action,it will have the impact on power system including voltage sag and impulse current.And if the impact is too large,it can cause the action of the protective relaying equipments.In this paper,the process of power transfer is theoretically studied;and the mathematical expressions for both residual voltage and impulse current are given.The paper analyzes the relay protection types likely to false operate when the power switches,as well as its reasons.Then the paper put forward some measures to make fast switch device cooperates with protective relaying.In these ways the impact of power switching will be decreased,and the false tripping of protective relaying can be prevented.Finally the success rate of power switching will be increased,and the reliability of power supply can be ensured.

4umx2kJI.title: The optimal switched law methods analysis and research on switched linear systems
4umx2kJI.abstract: The stable linear switched systems will converge to the balance Point. If different switched laws be chosen, the convergence Process will not be the same, so there is an optimal switched law. The issues of optimal switched law based on norm, convergence radius, convergence distance and convergence direction are respectively studied, and the optimal switched law is confirmed by solution of matrix equation. All kinds of instance have been considered synthetically, the synthetic optimal switched law is given, by which an optimal status of system in convergence process is reflected roundly. By calculate and simulation of practice examples and the using process of stability criterion is realized distinctly. © (2012) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

NXi7ji74.title: Application of Chaos theory in Cascaded Five Levels Variable Frequency and Variable Speed System
NXi7ji74.abstract: In recent years, the cascade multi-level technology has become hot spot in the electric power electron area. The technology can solve the contradiction between the switching frequency and the switching capacity of the large-power switching devices. But along with the number of cascade unit increases, unbalance usage becomes a problem. This paper proposes balanced control method based on Chaos Theory. It can be concluded from the distribute procedure based on random function that the active probability of each DC power source and switching devices is same. And the results of simulation prove the control strategies accuracy.

r1t9uka9.abstract: A method to prepare PBO pulp-precipitation process was put forward in this paper. PBO concentrated sulfuric acid solution was injected into a rapidly stirring coagulant then the PBO pulp was produced. The process parameters were studied. The optimal conditions of precipitation were: 1% consistency of PBO concentrated H2SO4 solution, diluted H2SO4 solution was used as coagulant, and stirring by a juice machine at the speed of 2000 r/min. The precipitated PBO pulp has higher specific area and better morphology. The properties of the precipitated pulp can be controlled by the concentration of the coagulant.

iMuwHzOz.title: Effects of Oligosaccharides and Peptides on Fermentation of Yogurt
iMuwHzOz.abstract: Effects of oligosaccharides and peptides on fermentation of yogurt were studied in this paper.Results showed that peptides were superior to oligosaccharides in reducing the fermentation time and casein-hydrolyzed peptide was shown to be the best one.Addition of peptides had little effect on the viscosity of yogurt,while addition of oligosaccharides could increase the viscosity of yogurt and mannan-oligosaccharide was the best for this purpose.In addition,addition of oligosaccharides and peptides has no obvious effect on taste and stability of yogurt but on the taste of yogurt.Besides,mannan-oligosaccharide and peptides could improve the thickness of yogurt.

jtyIGU8o.title: STABILITY OF THE ANTIOXIDANT ACTIVITY OF CHICKEN PROTEIN HYDROLYSATE
jtyIGU8o.abstract: To evaluate the stability of antioxidant activity of chicken protein hydrolysate(CPH), chicken protein was hydrolyzed by papain to investigate the effect of enzyme inactivation methods, evaporative condensation, dehydration methods and preserving time on the antioxidant activity of CPH. Results show that enzyme inactivation methods, evaporative condensation and dehydration methods had no significant effect on DPPH scavenging activity and reducing power of CPH(P>0.05), and the CPH preserved as chilly liquid, frozen solid or dried powder also had no remarkable influence on its DPPH scavenging activity and reducing power in half a year (P>0.05). It suggests that the antioxidant activities of CPH had good thermal stability and preserving stability.

UHAFLLok.title: Synthesis of super absorbant resin grafted by guar gum under microwave irradiation
UHAFLLok.abstract: Super absorbant polymer GAM was synthesized from guar gum, acrylic acid and acrylamide through graft copolymerization under microwave irradiation. The effects on water absorbability, such as power and time of microwave irradiation, reaction temperature, the mass ratio of acrylic acid/ acrylimid etc were investigated. Under optimal conditions the absorbant resin GAM has the wonderful water absorbant capacity: 1454 g/g of distilled water absorbancy and 169 g/g of physiological saline with high grafting percent of of 980%. Thermogravimetric analysis indicates that with contrast with guar gum, super absorbant resin GAM has better heat-resistant performance which demonstrates the grafting copolymerization.

QAuzUpVr.title: Hybrid Modeling and Simulation for the Boost Converter in Photovoltaic System
QAuzUpVr.abstract: Photovoltaic (PV) system is composed of several elements as solar cells, boost converter, inverter and load. Owing to the existence of converters, photovoltaic system is a hybrid system contains continuous dynamic and discrete dynamic. Traditionally, the power electronic converter is difficult to model. This paper illustrates the modeling method of hybrid system, especially finite automata model. Based on finite state machine (FSM), the hybrid modeling of boost converter is presented. Finally, provides a simulation environment for such combination between continuous time system and finite automata, which employs the simulink and stateflow from Matlab.
QAuzUpVr.venue: ICIC '09 Proceedings of the 2009 Second International Conference on Information and Computing Science - Volume 04

uetXEmZx.title: Effect of whey protein concentrate substituting for egg on the quality of the sponge cake
uetXEmZx.abstract: Effect of whey protein concentrate substituting for egg on the quality of the sponge cake was studied in this paper. The specific weight of the batter,the specific volume of cake,the hardness,elasticity and chewiness of cake were analyzed,and the sensory evaluation of cake was examined. The result showed that when the substitution ratio was less than 50% ,the specific weight of the batter,the specific volume and the texture of cake which had been stored by sealed nitrogen package for 60d were similar to that prepared with only egg. When the substitution ratio was 50% ,the sensory evaluation result of the cake was the best. It suggested that whey protein concentrate substituting for egg partially could be used to prepare sponge cake.

ljkJ7Vj8.title: Evaluationand Extension of Rice Varieties(Lines) in Regional(Performance) Test Resistant to Blast in Heilongjiang Province
ljkJ7Vj8.abstract: The resistance to rice blast of 274 rice varieties(lines)in regional(performance)test of the third and fourth accumulated temperature zone from 2006 to 2010 were identified by artificial infection in Heilongjiang province.The results showed that the resistant levels varied greatly with the varieties,of which none was highly resistant(HR)to blast,134 or 48.6% of the tested varieties were resistant to leaf blast,152 or 55.5% of the tested varieties were resistant to panicle blast.During 2006 to 2010,26 rice varieties were released.They were Longjing 20,Heijing No.8,Kendao 18,Longjing 25,Longjing 26,Longjing 29,Kenjing No.2,Longjing 31 and so on.The total accumulative plant area of these varieties was 2 480 700 hm2,accounting for 15.9% of 5 years total rice planting area of Heilongjiang province.

XeEF69Ma.title: The application of power electronic switches in high voltage quick switching device
XeEF69Ma.abstract: Microcomputer auxiliary power switching device turn-on time is generally 70ms ∼ 80ms, when some loads are sensitive and require short switching time that a few milliseconds or less, the microcomputer auxiliary power switching devices can not meet the requirements, which requires faster switching devices. Power electronic switch is a fast open-off switch device to meet the sensitive load requirements on switching time. This article mainly introduced the application of power electronic switch as high voltage quick switching device, and analyzed harmonic problems of power electronic switch. © 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd.

wyMSrZVy.title: SHAPF model based on LADRC and its current tracking control
wyMSrZVy.abstract: A state-space model is established based on PWM(Pulse Width Modulation) theory for the three- phase SHAPF(Shunt Hybrid Active Power Filter) used in middle-and high-voltage distribution systems and a current tracking controller based on LADRC(Linear Auto Disturbance Rejection Control technique) is designed for it, which estimates and compensates the general disturbance caused by all unknown internal dynamics and external disturbances to achieve the real-time tracking of command current. Its control algorithm is simple and easy to implement in practical projects. Simulative and experimental results validate the correctness of the established model and the control performance of the designed controller superior to PI controller.
keywords: Linear auto disturbance rejection control technique

xCiH4pIv.title: A survey of external feature of solar cells in partially shading
xCiH4pIv.abstract: Existing model of solar cells is not suitable for partial shading condition, which makes output current-voltage(I-V) curve of photovoltaic (PV) array staid-stepping. Furthermore, Power-Voltage(P-V) characteristics may exist more than two local peak value in partially shading which bring interferences to maximum power point tracking(MPPT). Based on modified engineering model of solar cells, an accurate model of array was proposed considering variation of shadows. And the I-V characteristic, P-V characteristic and yield of PV modules were analyzed. At last, the optimum output power with different shadows arrangement was discussed. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

b6K8BI3C.title: New control strategy analysis of the cascaded dynamic voltage restorer
b6K8BI3C.abstract: Cascaded dynamic voltage restorer (DVR) which is an effective setup in modifying the power quality problems caused by voltage sags has been applied in the power system. Thereby, the carrier phase-shifted modulation technology was used in the cascaded multilvevel inverter. A 5 MVA uncoupled transformer 11-level cascaded DVR was researched for the 6 kV power system. The double loop control strategy was designed which employed a slow outer voltage loop and a fast inner current loop. Voltage sag was simulated at a random time when multi-level DVR was under the control of any control strategy. Results show that the DVR based on voltage shifted pulse width modulation technology can greatly increase the inverter switching frequency and decrease the harmonic distortion and variation rate of voltage, and the system damping ratio and stability and error can be regulated by adjusting relevant parameters. The application of this technology can greatly enhance the performance indicators of DVR and has a high practical value.

9IFxLcoY.title: Review of STATCOM effects on relay protection of power system
9IFxLcoY.abstract: Flexible AC transmission technology (FACTS) is a new technology developed in recent years. It use power electronic technology and modern control technology to achieve fast control for AC transmission system parameter and structure [1], to achieve the rational allocation of transmission power, reduce the power loss and the cost of power generation, greatly improve the stability and reliability of the system. STATCOM is based on the principle of reactive power compensation, using full-controlled switching devices to compose self-commutated inventer, complemented by small-capacity storage elements constitute reactive power compensation device. Its role in the power system is the compensation of reactive power, maintain the voltage of the connection point, improve system voltage stability, and improve the steady performance and dynamic performance of the system. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

xCGCw19u.title: Hopf Bifurcation Control of Power System Based on High-Pass Filter Technology
xCGCw19u.abstract: To eliminate the Hopf bifurcation phenomena that occurs during the operation of power system and affects both power quality and power system security,a Washout filter technology based method to control Hopf bifurcation in power system is proposed.According to the condition by which the Hopf bifurcation occurs,the linear and nonlinear gain coefficients of high-pass filter controller are determined.Through the control the Hopf bifurcation point existed in the power system before the control can be effectively eliminated,thus the stability region of power system operation is expanded evidently.The effectiveness of the proposed method based on Washout filter is verified by results of theoretical analysis and simulation.

OoXSUaLS.title: Compensation strategy research in dynamic voltage restore
OoXSUaLS.abstract: The dynamic voltage restorer shows promise in providing a cost effective solution for the protection of sensitive loads from voltage sags. DVR as an important electrical installation has attracted many domestic and foreign researchers' attention. The paper discusses the voltage compensation strategy in a DVR. At first the working principle and the basic structure of the DVR are described in detail, and then based on typical topology, the advanced theory analysis of DVR compensation strategy are put forward, and an overview of studies on the advanced compensation strategy is provided. Finally, the future research trends of the DVR compensation strategy are discussed. © (2012) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

c2vep3CR.title: Review of control methods for active power filters
c2vep3CR.abstract: With the wide application of power electronic equipments in power system, more and more harmonic are poured into the power system, which cause power pollution and make the power quality problem increasingly serious. Active power filter (APF) is an important equipment to compensate harmonic and reactive current in power system. One of the key technologies lies in the real-time and accurate control. The fundamental principles of several control strategies of compensate current were presented, and the respective merit and demerit of these control strategies were pointed out with contrast analysis in this paper. Active power filter will achieve a higher performance and a wider application with the continuous development of the control strategy. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

QN6sA3oE.title: Cascade multi-level technology for dynamic voltage restorer
QN6sA3oE.abstract: The voltage-shifted pulse width modulation technology is researched and the transformer-less DVR which applies 11-level cascaded structure based on in-phase disposition (IPD) voltage shifted modulation technology is designed. An improved 'abc-dq' transaction detection algorithm which can detect the system voltage amplitude and phase accurately and rapidly is used in the system, and the minimal voltage compensation strategy is adopted to compensate voltage drop. The simulation results by the Matlab/Simulink software show that, the 11-level cascaded H-bridge transformer-less DVR based on voltage shifted pulse width modulation technology can greatly increase the inverter switching frequency, and decrease the harmonic distortion and voltage rate of change, thereby it fully meets the high quality requirements of voltage. The application of this technology can greatly enhance the performance indicators of DVR and has a high practical value.

1rXh5K9c.title: Breeding Report on Early Maturity,High Yield and High Quality Rice Variety Longjing 22
1rXh5K9c.abstract: [Objective] The purpose was to supply theoretical basis for the popularization and cultivation of Longjiang 22.[Method] Through comparing the growth,quality,disease and cold resistance indexes of Longjing 22 and control variety,the production potential and popularizationi value of Longjing 22 were discussed.[Result] The number of Longjing 22's leaves on main stem was eleven,maturation period was 130 d and the active accumulated temperature was 2 300 ℃(≥10 ℃).It had quite healthy seedlings and strong resistance to lodging and frost.In the regional tests in 3 years,its average yield being 4.0% higher than that of control variety was 8.37 t/hm2.In the production test,its average yield being 9.0% higher than that of control variety was 9.52 t/hm2.It had good quality and all kinds of indices met the national standards for high quality rice.[Conclusion] Longjing 22 had early maturity,good quality and high yield,so it has better popularization potential and application foreground in the Third Accumulative Temperature Belt of Heilongjiang Province.

ncNczSRI.title: Application of Modified Soybean Protein in the Whipped Cream
ncNczSRI.abstract: The emulsification property,emulsifying stability and foaming property of modified soybean protein(MSP) were studied.The effects of MSP substituting for imported sodium caseinate application in the whipped cream on the whipping time,foaming rate,shape retention,roughening degree,just melting feeling in the mouth,glossiness,smooth degree and greasy feeling were also studied.Results showed that the emulsification property,emulsifying stability,foaming property of MSP were between imported sodium caseinate and homebred sodium caseinate,but superior to the homebred soybean protein isolate.The whipped cream containing MSP to 50%substitute for imported sodium caseinate had good quality.

Sh5tNKSF.title: Review of electric load modeling research
Sh5tNKSF.abstract: The effect of load model on the analyses of load flow, transient stability, small disturbance stability and voltage stability is analyzed. The importance of the load modeling research is emphasized. The development of component-based method and measurement-based method is reviewed. The advances on the load model research including the select ion of load model structure, model parameters identification, load model with the voltage stability analysis and the sensitivity of load model to the transient stability is summarized. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.
